name: Wp Custom scrollbar
author: Jillur Rahman, Asiancoders

sections.description:
Wp Custom scrollbar is nicescroll wordpress plugin. You change your scroll bar just one click. And you get powerful option panel.

Features

features of Wp Custom scrollbar

  • Lightweight
  • Powerful opinion panel
  • Easy to use
  • Just install and work
  • All browser support
  • Translatable .pot file included.

Credits: jquery nicescroll

Email for Support: asiancodersteam@gmail.com

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Automatic installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload and select the .zip file from your hard disk
  2. Click the “Install now” button
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Manual installation

  1. Download a copy (zip file) of this plugin from WordPress.org.
  2. Unzip the zip file.
  3. Upload the unzipped directory to your website’s plugin directory (/wp-content/plugins/).
  4. Log into WordPress Dashboard of your website.
  5. Activate this plugin through the “Plugins” tab.

After installation, a “Wp Custom scrollbar”  menu item will appear in the “Appearance” section. Click on this in order to view plugin’s administration page.

Can I use this plugin on my language?

Yes. But If your language is not available then you can make one. This plugin is ready for translation. The sublimejsedit.pot file is included and placed in “languages” folder. You need to just translate asiancoderswcs_text.pot file.

How To get Optons panel

just select your targeted layout ID or Class ID=# or Class=. or any html tag
Then go to page “Appearance” —> “Wp Custom scrollbar” and enter your custom JavaScript. Example:
